mapper.sql: PM_ID, BUILDING_FULL_ROOM, PM_UP_ID, ENERGY, PM_MONTH, PM_BEGIN_DATE, PM_END_DATE, PM_FLAG, PM_OBJECT,MONTH_FEE, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6
mapper.select: select bf.BUILDING_FULL_ROOM ,pup.PM_UP_PRICE from building_info bf, pm_unit_price pup where bf.BUILDING_TYPE_ID = pup.BUILDING_TYPE_ID and HOUSING_USAGE NOT IN ('un')
mapper.insert: insert into pm_fee (PM_ID, BUILDING_FULL_ROOM, PM_UP_ID, ENERGY, PM_MONTH, PM_BEGIN_DATE, PM_END_DATE, PM_FLAG, PM_OBJECT, MONTH_FEE, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6 ) values (#{pmId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{buildingFullRoom,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pmUpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{energy,jdbcType=REAL}, #{pmMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pmBeginDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{pmEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, 'N', #{pmObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{monthFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update pm_fee
BUILDING_FULL_ROOM = #{buildingFullRoom,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PM_UP_ID = #{pmUpId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ENERGY = #{energy,jdbcType=REAL},
PM_MONTH = #{pmMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PM_BEGIN_DATE = #{pmBeginDate,jdbcType=DATE},
PM_END_DATE = #{pmEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
PM_FLAG = #{pmFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PM_OBJECT = #{pmObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PM_ID = #{pmId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pm_fee set BUILDING_FULL_ROOM = #{buildingFullRoom,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PM_UP_ID = #{pmUpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ENERGY = #{energy,jdbcType=REAL}, PM_MONTH = #{pmMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PM_BEGIN_DATE = #{pmBeginDate,jdbcType=DATE}, PM_END_DATE = #{pmEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, PM_FLAG = #{pmFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PM_OBJECT = #{pmObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONTH_FEE = #{monthFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PM_ID = #{pmId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
